snippet.title: ABI-DOS Announcement Trailer (old one)
snippet.description: ABI-DOS is an innovative open-ended automation puzzle game. Design complex circuits using a fictional assembly language to solve problems within operational and spatial constraints that demand a high level of creativity and logic, all set in a retro-punk inspired world. Find it on Steam! To be released on 2024.
